short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login to Facebook using an access token

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Login to Instagram with your Token

This extension allows you to log into Facebook with your account Token.

Be VERY careful with extensions that access your Facebook Token. A single malicious update could compromise your Tokens. Anyone with your Token can take control of your Instagram account.
